gr.athena.innovation.fagi.rule

Class RuleProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.athena.innovation.fagi.rule.RuleProcessor

  • public class RuleProcessor
extends Object
    Reads the XML file that contains the fusion rules and turns it into in-memory structures that the rest of the application can access. This processor is does not validate the XML input. The validation is performed one step before using the InputValidator isValidInput method.
    Author:
    nkarag

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RuleProcessor() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RuleCatalog parseRules(String path)
      The rules are parsed and modeled in memory as follows: Rule | ActionRule | Condition | Expression

    • Method Detail

      • parseRules

        public RuleCatalog parseRules(String path)
                       throws ParserConfigurationException,
                              SAXException,
                              IOException,
                              WrongInputException
        The rules are parsed and modeled in memory as follows: Rule | ActionRule | Condition | Expression
        Parameters:
        path - of the rules XML file.
        Returns:
        The RuleCatalog object that holds the rules configuration.
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException - indicates a configuration error.
        SAXException - encapsulates a general SAX error or warning.
        IOException - signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
        WrongInputException - something is wrong with the provided input.
